item.title: U.S. stock futures sink after Powell accuses Trump of intimidation over DOJ probe
item.description: With earnings season about to kick off, U.S. stock futures slipped Sunday, after the Dow and S&P 500 closed Friday at record highs.

item.title: Motional puts AI at center of robotaxi reboot as it targets 2026 for driverless service
item.description: Motional says it will launch a driverless robotaxi service in Las Vegas before the end of 2026.

item.title: Symptoms That May Signal Heart Disease
item.description: From palpitations to shortness of breath, some symptoms can point to different heart conditions. Here’s how to tell them apart.

item.title: Allegiant to acquire rival Sun Country Airlines in budget airline merger
item.description: Allegiant Air plans to acquire rival Sun Country Airlines in a merger that would bring together two of America's ultra-low-cost carriers.

item.title: Nuclear startups are back in vogue with small reactors, and big challenges
item.description: Small modular reactor startups are betting that mass manufacturing will help them bring costs down. But are they underestimating the challenge?

item.title: Instagram says there’s been ‘no breach’ despite password reset requests
item.description: Instagram says that although some users received suspicious-looking password reset requests, it has not been breached.

item.title: Google co-founders may be leaving California
item.description: Sergey Brin and Larry Page appear to be pulling back from the state where they co-founded Google.

item.title: Avelo consolidates bases and fleet, ends deportation flights amid broader restructuring
item.description: Avelo Airlines said it was closing three of its bases and reconsolidating its network around the remaining four as it seeks to firm up its finances.
